data.eml:eml: The genus Ugandatrichia Mosely (Trichoptera, Hydroptilidae) in Japan

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ito, Tomiko, Ohkawa, Ayuko (2012): The genus Ugandatrichia Mosely (Trichoptera, Hydroptilidae) in Japan. Zootaxa 3394: 48-58, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.281790
